title: The Hunger Scale
itunes:title: The Hunger Scale
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

In this episode we put a name to the concept of knowing when to start and stop eating - The Hunger Scale. It's a tool I teach my Tribe that helps frame the concepts of eating when you are slightly hungry and stopping when you're satisfied. I give lots of tips on how to identify your body's signals, and I tell how you messing it up is the only way to learn.
